General.Description: Worldwide Asset eXchange is called as WAX. WAX is a decentralized platform that enables anyone to operate a fully functioning virtual marketplace with no investment in security, infrastructure, or even payment processing. WAX has served more than 400 million online players who buy and sell in-game items.
General.Features: WAX has many attributes that attracts customers such as protecting against price volatility, security against scams, etc. Furthermore, WAX platform can be huge established market–where the buyers and sellers to exchange virtual goods.
General.Technology: The WAX is developed by OPSkins which is the top digital marketplace in the world, with over 100 million annual transactions.
General.Sponsor: WAX was developed by the founders of OPSkins, the world’s leading marketplace for online video game assets.
